text: Svobodny () is a rural locality (a settlement) in Khatukayskoye Rural Settlement of Krasnogvardeysky District, Adygea, Russia. The population was 8 as of 2018.Численность постоянного населения по МО и населенным пунктам Республики Адыгея по состоянию на 1 января 2018 года There are 5 streets. == Geography == The settlement is located 7 km north-east from Krasnogvardeyskoye. == References == Category:Rural localities in Krasnogvardeysky District
title: Svobodny, Republic of Adygea
